summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5602 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Northeast, from East 62nd Street to East 65th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73726, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
